# DISP ASPECT

Choose the aspect ratio used for the display of still pictures on High Definition (HD) devices (this option is available only when an HDMI cable is connected).

!HDMI Connection

| Options |        |
|---------|--------|
| 16:9    | 3:2    |

> ðŸ’¡ **Note:**
> Choose **16:9** to display photos with an aspect ratio of 16:9 full screen. The pictures will be displayed full screen with tops and bottoms cropped out.
